content: शूकः, --कं {@--1@} The awn of barley &c., beard. {@--2@} A bristle; वृतं च खलु शूकैः <ls>Bv. 1. 24.</ls> {@--3@} Point, tip, sharp end. {@--4@} Tenderness, compassion. {@--5@} A kind of poisonous insect. {@--6@} The bristle or sharp hair of insects. --का A cowach.
